content.raw:
Maybe this is not fixed, I have a model that shows the same issues that explained here.



```
#!sdf

<?xml version='1.0'?>
<sdf version='1.3'>
    <model name="Joint planes">
        
    <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>
    
    <link name="link">
        
        <self_collide> true </self_collide>
        
        <pose> 0 0 0.15 0 0 0 </pose>
        
        <collision name="collision">
            
            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.3 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>
            
        </collision>
        
        <visual name="visual">
            
            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.3 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>
            
            <material>
                <script>
                    <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
                    <name>Gazebo/Red</name>
                </script>
            </material>
        </visual>
        
    </link>
    
    <link name="l1_l2">
        
        <pose> 0.5 0 0.5 1.5707963267948966 0 0 </pose>
        
        <collision name="collision">
            
            <geometry>
                <cylinder>
                    <radius> 0.01 </radius>
                    <length> 1.0 </length>
                </cylinder>
            </geometry>
            
        </collision>
        
        <visual name="visual">
            <geometry>
                <cylinder>
                    <radius> 0.01 </radius>
                    <length> 1.0 </length>
                </cylinder>
            </geometry>
            
            <material>
                <script>
                    <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
                    <name>Gazebo/Grey</name>
                </script>
            </material>
        </visual>
        
    </link>
    
    <link name="link2">
        
        <self_collide> true </self_collide>
        
        <pose> 0 0 0.8 0 0 0 </pose>
        
        <collision name="collisionx">
            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.1 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>
        </collision>
        
        <visual name="visualx">
            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.1 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>
            <material>
                <script>
                    <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
                    <name>Gazebo/Green</name>
                </script>
            </material>
        </visual>
    </link>
    
    <joint type="revolute" name="two_planes">
        <parent> link </parent>
        <child> l1_l2 </child>
        <axis>
            <xyz> 0 1 0 </xyz>
            <limit>
                <lower> 0 </lower>
                <upper> 0 </upper>
            </limit>
        </axis>
        
        <physics>
            <ode>
                <limit>
                    <cfm>0.0</cfm>
                    <erp>0.9</erp>
                </limit> 
            </ode>
        </physics>
    </joint>
    
    <joint type="revolute" name="two_planes2">
        <parent> link2 </parent>
        <child> l1_l2 </child>
        <axis>
            <xyz> 0 1 0 </xyz>
        </axis>
        
        <physics>
            <ode>
                <limit>
                    <cfm>0.0</cfm>
                    <erp>0.9</erp>
                </limit> 
            </ode>
        </physics>
    </joint>
    
    </model>
</sdf>
```
content.html:
Maybe this is not fixed, I have a model that shows the same issues that explained here.

<?xml version='1.0'?>
<sdf version='1.3'>
    <model name="Joint planes">

    <pose>0 0 0 0 0 0</pose>

    <link name="link">

        <self_collide> true </self_collide>

        <pose> 0 0 0.15 0 0 0 </pose>

        <collision name="collision">

            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.3 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>

        </collision>

        <visual name="visual">

            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.3 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>

            <material>
                <script>
                    <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
                    <name>Gazebo/Red</name>
                </script>
            </material>
        </visual>

    </link>

    <link name="l1_l2">

        <pose> 0.5 0 0.5 1.5707963267948966 0 0 </pose>

        <collision name="collision">

            <geometry>
                <cylinder>
                    <radius> 0.01 </radius>
                    <length> 1.0 </length>
                </cylinder>
            </geometry>

        </collision>

        <visual name="visual">
            <geometry>
                <cylinder>
                    <radius> 0.01 </radius>
                    <length> 1.0 </length>
                </cylinder>
            </geometry>

            <material>
                <script>
                    <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
                    <name>Gazebo/Grey</name>
                </script>
            </material>
        </visual>

    </link>

    <link name="link2">

        <self_collide> true </self_collide>

        <pose> 0 0 0.8 0 0 0 </pose>

        <collision name="collisionx">
            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.1 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>
        </collision>

        <visual name="visualx">
            <geometry>
                <box>
                    <size> 1 1 0.1 </size>
                </box>
            </geometry>
            <material>
                <script>
                    <uri>file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material</uri>
                    <name>Gazebo/Green</name>
                </script>
            </material>
        </visual>
    </link>

    <joint type="revolute" name="two_planes">
        <parent> link </parent>
        <child> l1_l2 </child>
        <axis>
            <xyz> 0 1 0 </xyz>
            <limit>
                <lower> 0 </lower>
                <upper> 0 </upper>
            </limit>
        </axis>

        <physics>
            <ode>
                <limit>
                    <cfm>0.0</cfm>
                    <erp>0.9</erp>
                </limit> 
            </ode>
        </physics>
    </joint>

    <joint type="revolute" name="two_planes2">
        <parent> link2 </parent>
        <child> l1_l2 </child>
        <axis>
            <xyz> 0 1 0 </xyz>
        </axis>

        <physics>
            <ode>
                <limit>
                    <cfm>0.0</cfm>
                    <erp>0.9</erp>
                </limit> 
            </ode>
        </physics>
    </joint>

    </model>
</sdf>
